rows.label: qst202020_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, could you secretly buy
me some Bitter Choclit?

rows.label: qst202020_msg0002
rows.name: If I ask Musubi, she'll just lecture me

rows.label: qst202020_msg0003
rows.name: She never buys the stuff for me.

rows.label: qst202020_msg0004
rows.name: Old man, you never learn, do you...

rows.label: qst202020_msg0005
rows.name: Oh well, we'll buy it for you.

rows.label: qst202020_msg0007
rows.name:
Oh right, could you also buy some
ohagi along with the Bitter Choclit?

rows.label: qst202020_msg0009
rows.name: For Choclit, that would be Fons Maim.

rows.label: qst202020_msg0010
rows.name:
As for ohagi, you don't
see them much these days.

rows.label: qst202020_msg0011
rows.name:
In the old days, you'd see them
often in Gula and Avaritia...

rows.label: qst202020_msg0012
rows.name:
Perhaps if trade picks up again,
they might make a comeback.

rows.label: qst202020_msg0013
rows.name: Got it. I'll find some somehow!
